official_title: A bill to provide for an immediate 10 percent increase in the pay and allowances of members of the uniformed services and to provide for automatic semi-annual cost-of-living increases in such pay and allowances thereafter.
short_title: Uniformed Services Cost of Living Pay Adjustment Act of 1980

summary.text: Uniformed Services Cost-of-Living Pay Adjustment Act of 1980 - Increases the pay and allowances of members of the uniformed services by ten percent. Provides for semiannual cost of living increases in such pay and allowances.

titles.title: Uniformed Services Cost of Living Pay Adjustment Act of 1980

A bill to provide for an immediate 10 percent increase in the pay and allowances of members of the uniformed services and to provide for automatic semi-annual cost-of-living increases in such pay and allowances thereafter.
